snippet: South Korea's acting president Hwang Kyo-ahn said on Monday Seoul should swiftly complete the deployment of a U.S. anti-missile defense system after North Korea launched four missiles earlier in the day....

headline.main: In Season Openers, the Red Bulls Rally and New York City F.C. Falls Short
headline.print_headline: Red Bulls Rally to Win Season Opener

lead_paragraph: South Korea's acting president Hwang Kyo-ahn said on Monday Seoul should swiftly complete the deployment of a U.S. anti-missile defense system after North Korea launched four missiles earlier in the day.
